channel.title: Control317 - Eco - New server - Perfect server for you
channel.description:
[center][b][u]Control317[/u][/b][/center]
Brand new server with a lot to offer!
Control317 is a brand new server and will soon be one of the most successful. The server has only just been released, yet with our improvements and fixes, Control317 is soon going to be a server everyone will remember.
Control317 is an Economy server:
This basically means there's no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM or from PKing. This means our items will have value, making everything more fun, giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally get that kill for rare items. There are tons of different ways to exchange your items including specific market areas, clan chats, and even a section on forums. Being a new server we want to get our economy right the first time. To ensure we achieve this we have made drop rates at a perfect level to maintain item drops for PvMers, but also to give just enough that we're not flooded with items and massive inflation like you see on most other private servers.
The Control317 Experience:
Control317 community is like no other! As soon as you join you will notice our wilderness, brand new forums, and impressive PvMing system. Here at Control317, we like to have a good time aswell as bring you the players the best possible experience that we can give you.
Our community gives a warm welcome to all new players, and presents them with many opportunity to get involded with activities and get to know existing members. Anyone that joins will be flooded with welcomes and will be helped as much as they desire to be helped.
The Control317 Staff Team:
All of Control317 staff are hand-picked based off applications anyone is free to submit. These application then get voted on by our staff team and those few that provide the best application will get a chance to prove them selves. Not only do we make sure we have staff from EVERY different time zone. We make sure we have the nicest most helpful staff available for you. Many of our staff all have previous experience from other major private Server, which means you get professional support and help when every you may need it.
Control317 Development & Progress:
The development team here at Control317 knows quality updates have to come from what the community wants. Once you’ve become a part of the spectacular Control317 community, you’ll notice weekly updates, with. You can put your ideas forward as suggestions on our forums and have your voice heard and see your ideas implemented if fellow players support you.
Features: - Working highscores - Flawless skills - Perfect Duel Arena - Barrows Minigame - Custom home pk with lvl 10 wildy - Friendly Staff and Active staff from all over the world - Hundreds of PVM and PVP opportunities with countless rewards - Flawless slayer - Perfect PKing with flawless switching and perfect hybriding - Every working special attack you can think of - Dice - Donator Islands with lots of helpful donation perks! - Active forums
Here are some pictures of the server althought they dont cover everything we actually do offer for you.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1ghb2h.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/10fb3pe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/bdskzp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ci8sjn.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2eojyn9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/33a412x.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/20a82m1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/5ybxch.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2wp1j4p.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/foznkx.png[/img]
The website link:
http://www.control317.com
If you wish to play just now you can play the webclient or download the client here:
http://www.control317.com/webclient.php

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

http://www.control317.com/forums/index.php?topic=18.msg30#msg30

your welcome?

At the moment the community is pretty close to each other that’s about all I can speak for. I was on earlier and everyone are friends so that’s nice.

Read full topic
